job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* 𝐏𝐑𝐎𝐉𝐄𝐂𝐓 𝟏 : Recently started a long-term project to modernize our list trading system using modern C++ features and programming practices.
     * Working in a C++ environment on Windows and Linux platforms, enhancing and maintaining backend servers (C++) used for real-time trading applications, contributing during all phases of the project lifecycle, working with business counterparts to provide technical solutions to client needs, working with QA and supporting teams to address issues that arise during development and testing;
     * 𝐏𝐑𝐎𝐉𝐄𝐂𝐓 𝟐 : This role will work primarily within our Treasury and Mortgage trading product groups. These products cover two of the most liquid asset classes in the world.

   Tradeweb is a market leader in providing innovative capabilities to some of the largest Investment Banks, Asset Managers, and Hedge Funds in these areas.

   The Developer will work in a C++ environment on the Windows platform and enhance and maintain backend servers (C++) used for real-time trading applications.

   𝐏𝐑𝐎𝐉𝐄𝐂𝐓 𝟑 : In this role the work is done with a substantial codebase, requiring an inquiring and tenacious approach to development and maintenance.

   You'll need to implement code for interfacing with the Tradeweb Dealer Pricing System and Tradeweb Trading System. The Pricing Group develops distributed systems for publishing real-time Market Data.

   This group makes use of several 3rd party tools to distribute, store and retrieve market data TW LLM infrastructure, Tervela TMX, OneTick Database.
job_details.full_text:
C++ Developer

* 𝐏𝐑𝐎𝐉𝐄𝐂𝐓 𝟏 : Recently started a long-term project to modernize our list trading system using modern C++ features and programming practices.
     * Working in a C++ environment on Windows and Linux platforms, enhancing and maintaining backend servers (C++) used for real-time trading applications, contributing during all phases of the project lifecycle, working with business counterparts to provide technical solutions to client needs, working with QA and supporting teams to address issues that arise during development and testing;
     * 𝐏𝐑𝐎𝐉𝐄𝐂𝐓 𝟐 : This role will work primarily within our Treasury and Mortgage trading product groups. These products cover two of the most liquid asset classes in the world.

   Tradeweb is a market leader in providing innovative capabilities to some of the largest Investment Banks, Asset Managers, and Hedge Funds in these areas.

   The Developer will work in a C++ environment on the Windows platform and enhance and maintain backend servers (C++) used for real-time trading applications.

   𝐏𝐑𝐎𝐉𝐄𝐂𝐓 𝟑 : In this role the work is done with a substantial codebase, requiring an inquiring and tenacious approach to development and maintenance.

   You'll need to implement code for interfacing with the Tradeweb Dealer Pricing System and Tradeweb Trading System. The Pricing Group develops distributed systems for publishing real-time Market Data.

   This group makes use of several 3rd party tools to distribute, store and retrieve market data TW LLM infrastructure, Tervela TMX, OneTick Database.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional C++ software development for trading systems, with no mention of AI, machine learning, or generative models. It lacks the core elements required for ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles.

evidence.phrase: working with business counterparts to provide technical solutions to client needs
evidence.justification: This phrase indicates interaction with business stakeholders to understand their needs and translate them into technical solutions, which is a core aspect of business understanding.

evidence.phrase: These products cover two of the most liquid asset classes in the world.
evidence.justification: This provides context about the business domain (financial markets) and the significance of the products, demonstrating an understanding of the business landscape.

evidence.phrase: Tradeweb is a market leader in providing innovative capabilities to some of the largest Investment Banks, Asset Managers, and Hedge Funds in these areas.
evidence.justification: This highlights the company's market position and client base, contributing to the understanding of the business environment.

evidence.phrase: modernize our list trading system using modern C++ features and programming practices
evidence.justification: This directly relates to software development, specifically modernizing an existing system with C++.

evidence.phrase: Working in a C++ environment on Windows and Linux platforms, enhancing and maintaining backend servers (C++)
evidence.justification: This describes core software development activities: working with a specific language and platform, and maintaining backend servers.

evidence.phrase: contributing during all phases of the project lifecycle
evidence.justification: This implies involvement in the full software development lifecycle, from inception to deployment and maintenance.

evidence.phrase: The Developer will work in a C++ environment on the Windows platform and enhance and maintain backend servers (C++)
evidence.justification: This reiterates the focus on C++ development and maintenance of backend systems.

evidence.phrase: implement code for interfacing with the Tradeweb Dealer Pricing System and Tradeweb Trading System.
evidence.justification: This is a specific software development task involving integration with existing systems.

evidence.phrase: The Pricing Group develops distributed systems for publishing real-time Market Data.
evidence.justification: This describes the development of complex distributed systems, a key software engineering activity.

evidence.phrase: working with QA and supporting teams to address issues that arise during development and testing
evidence.justification: This involves collaboration with support and QA teams to resolve issues, which touches upon the operational aspects of software delivery, though not specifically MLOps.

evidence.phrase: provide technical solutions to client needs
evidence.justification: This indicates a focus on solving client problems through technical means.

evidence.phrase: address issues that arise during development and testing
evidence.justification: This highlights the need to identify and resolve problems encountered during the development process.

evidence.phrase: requiring an inquiring and tenacious approach to development and maintenance.
evidence.justification: This directly describes the need for problem-solving skills (inquiring) and persistence (tenacious) in tackling complex development and maintenance tasks.

evidence.phrase: modernize our list trading system using modern C++ features and programming practices.
evidence.justification: The use of 'modernize' suggests an initiative to improve existing systems, implying innovation and taking ownership of the modernization effort.

evidence.phrase: contributing during all phases of the project lifecycle
evidence.justification: This implies taking responsibility and ownership throughout the entire project, not just specific parts.

evidence.phrase: working with business counterparts to provide technical solutions to client needs
evidence.justification: This requires communication and collaboration with non-technical business stakeholders.

evidence.phrase: working with QA and supporting teams to address issues that arise during development and testing
evidence.justification: This necessitates collaboration with QA and support teams.
